ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Especially if you re a human wizard.  Well, not especially... but any race other than dark elf, troll, and ogre is KOS by the neriak guards, who wander all
ygData.messageBody:
Especially if you're a human wizard. Well, not especially... but any race
other than dark elf, troll, and ogre is KOS by the neriak guards, who wander
all over nektulos forest.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Billy Sun <bsun@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:56 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>
>Even I'm a human wizard??!!
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 1:55 PM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell
>

>> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>>
>> Neriak is extremely safe and quick to travel to from freeport, just zone
>> from ecommons into the nektulos forrest and head along path to neriak.
It
>> will take about 5 minutes. Only problem is as soon as any npc sees you,
>you
>> willed be killed on sight, and very quickly too. So Neriak probably
>> shouldn't be your first choice.
>>
>> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
